query:
SELECT nature, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CAST(amount AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as sum_amount
FROM transactions 
WHERE isPaid = 1 AND date <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2026-02-01 23:59:59') * 1000
GROUP BY nature;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 26x2gGqtj2qmxT9.dbac34d63271 --database BpLVoFkZmNnvLiHEa2tSFD --execute SELECT nature, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CAST(amount AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as sum_amount
FROM transactions 
WHERE isPaid = 1 AND date <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('2026-02-01 23:59:59') * 1000
GROUP BY nature;
